page.title: 18CIVIC LEADERS IN CARLTON
page.content: INTERVIEW WITH THE MAYOR. Q.WHAT IS YOUR FULL NAME AND THE NAME OF THE MAYORESS? A.BERYL FROST AND EDWARD FROST. Q.HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN A COUNCILLOR? A.NINE YEARS. Q.FOR HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN MAYOR OF GEDLING? A.ELEVEN MONTHS. Q.HOW LONG WILL GEDLING BOROUGH COUNCIL BE HOUSED IN THIS BUILDING? A.UNTIL OCTOBER 1985 .Q. HOW LONG HAS G.B.C BEEN IN EXISTANCE? A.SINCE 1973. Q.HOW MANY FELLOW COUNCILLORS DO YOU HAVE AND WHAT ARE THIER DUTIES? A.58 COUNCILLORS THIER DUTIES ARE HOUSING AND RECREATION. Q.HOW MUCH IS THE CHAIN OF OFFICE WORTH ALTOGETHER? A.THE MEDALLION IS WORTH Â£1,000 AND THE CHAIN IS WORTH Â£750.
